      • blendColors

        private static int blendColors(int color1,
                               int color2,
                               float ratio)
        Blend color1 and color2 using the given ratio.
        Parameters:
        ratio - of which to blend. 1.0 will return color1, 0.5 will give an even blend, 0.0 will return color2.
